title: Ghana coach Grant wants four debutants to prove they deserve Black Stars stay in Canada friendly
text:
15:10 CET Ghana coach Grant wants four debutants to prove they deserve Black Stars stay in Canada friendly - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghana coach Avram Grant says the four debutants in the Black Stars must prove they deserve to stay in the national team permanently with their performance in tonightâ€™s friendly against Canada in Washington. 
The Israeli has been forced to include a number of debutants in their squad for the match versus Canada because of injuries and visa problems. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
